title: Pro-Israel John Fetterman skips DNC; his staff takes 'might makes rights' jibe
content: Senator John Fetterman known for his pro-Israel stance keeps his distance from the Democratic National Convention saving the party from any conflict on the Israel-Hamas issue but in an interview with the Free Press, the Democratic leader said his absence from the DNC has nothing to with his stand on Israel. Meanwhile, his communications director whose job is to represent him said she does not agree with her boss on the issue of Israel-Gaza.
summary: Senator John Fetterman known for his pro-Israel stance keeps his distance from the Democratic National Convention saving the party from any conflict on the Israel-Hamas issue but in an interview with the Free Press, the Democratic leader said his absence from the DNC has nothing to with his stand on Israel. Meanwhile, his communications director whose job is to represent him said she does not agree with her boss on the issue of Israel-Gaza.

title: Migrant workers on Scottish fishing boats ‘treated as slaves’
Why Joe Biden, Jill will skip Kamala Harris, Barack Obama's speeches at DNC
content: Joe Biden will deliver his political swan song tonight at the Democratic National Convention as Kamala Harris will accept the presidential nomination in Chicago but the Bidens will not stay put at Chicago to attend Kamala Harris' event scheduled on Thursday. They will fly to California for a six-day vacation and they will not be there to attend former president Barack Obama's speech at the convention either.
summary: Joe Biden will deliver his political swan song tonight at the Democratic National Convention as Kamala Harris will accept the presidential nomination in Chicago but the Bidens will not stay put at Chicago to attend Kamala Harris' event scheduled on Thursday. They will fly to California for a six-day vacation and they will not be there to attend former president Barack Obama's speech at the convention either.

title: Kamala Harris criticized for 'Democracy is...' remark; 'They took her off teleprompter'
content: Vice president Kamala Harris' statement on the duality of democracy is the latest flashpoint between the Dem and the GOP as the Republicans called Harris' statement the latest example of "word salad". Harris in her statement said democracy is both "incredibly strong" and "incredibly fragile". Republicans said Harris was off the teleprompter and hence dished a word salad.
summary: Vice president Kamala Harris' statement on the duality of democracy is the latest flashpoint between the Dem and the GOP as the Republicans called Harris' statement the latest example of "word salad". Harris in her statement said democracy is both "incredibly strong" and "incredibly fragile". Republicans said Harris was off the teleprompter and hence dished a word salad.

title: 'F**k you!': Biden's friend shuts down ex-Obama aide ahead of DNC
content: ​"Isn't it great that f--king guy finally figured out he had to quit?" the ex-Obama aide said. Barnicle did not follow and asked, "What guy?!' After learning that it was Joe Biden the ex-Obama aide was talking about, Barnicle said, "You know something? F***k you! And f***k all your friends with their anonymous quotes in the papers. Put your name on it next time!"
summary: ​"Isn't it great that f--king guy finally figured out he had to quit?" the ex-Obama aide said. Barnicle did not follow and asked, "What guy?!' After learning that it was Joe Biden the ex-Obama aide was talking about, Barnicle said, "You know something? F***k you! And f***k all your friends with their anonymous quotes in the papers. Put your name on it next time!"

title: US presidential elections: Crunch time in Chicago as Democrats and MAGA duke it out over Doritos
content: Democrats gathered in Chicago for a four-day event to build momentum for Kamala Harris, the presidential nominee. Outgoing President Biden spoke first, followed by other party notables. Despite leading in polls, Harris faces challenges, including attacks from white nationalists and accusations. Microsoft's AI warning highlights the growing influence of AI-generated disinformation in the election.
summary: Democrats gathered in Chicago for a four-day event to build momentum for Kamala Harris, the presidential nominee. Outgoing President Biden spoke first, followed by other party notables. Despite leading in polls, Harris faces challenges, including attacks from white nationalists and accusations. Microsoft's AI warning highlights the growing influence of AI-generated disinformation in the election.

title: Who is 'British Bill Gates' Mike Lynch missing in Bayesian yacht sinking off Sicily?
content: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch who is called the British Bill Gates went missing after the Bayesian superyacht with 22 people on board -- including two Americans and a Canadian -- sank off the coast in Sicily during a violent storm Monday. Lynch co-founded Autonomy, a software firm that pioneered in the UK tech scene, in the mid-90s.
summary: Tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch who is called the  British Bill Gates went missing after the Bayesian superyacht with 22 people on board -- including two Americans and a Canadian -- sank off the coast in Sicily during a violent storm Monday. Lynch co-founded Autonomy, a software firm that pioneered in the UK tech scene, in the mid-90s.

title: Set up by Hasina, Bangladesh war crimes tribunal to now probe her
content: Under Hasina's rule, the ICT sentenced more than 100 people to death, including several of her political opponents. The ICT has been criticized by rights groups for not adhering to international conventions.
summary: Under Hasina's rule, the ICT sentenced more than 100 people to death, including several of her political opponents. The ICT has been criticized by rights groups for not adhering to international conventions.

title: Ukraine officials order evacuation of families from Pokrovsk as Russian troops approach
Terror attack in Pakistan kills three security personnel
content: Militants from Afghanistan attacked a Pakistani border security post in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, resulting in the deaths of three security personnel. This incident followed two other attacks within the same province, which left four security personnel dead. The attacks targeted the Bargai police station and vehicles of the Frontier Constabulary.
summary: Militants from Afghanistan attacked a Pakistani border security post in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, resulting in the deaths of three security personnel. This incident followed two other attacks within the same province, which left four security personnel dead. The attacks targeted the Bargai police station and vehicles of the Frontier Constabulary.

title: Kamala Harris' nomination ignites local organizers to rally Black voters
content: Reuters spoke with more than a dozen groups that are ramping up get-out-the-vote efforts through digital organizing, door-knocking, and targeting low-propensity voters in swing states.
summary: Reuters spoke with more than a dozen groups that are ramping up get-out-the-vote efforts through digital organizing, door-knocking, and targeting low-propensity voters in swing states.

title: Britain takes emergency action to prevent prisons in northern England from becoming overcrowded
content: The recent civil disorder has heaped pressure on prisons in England and Wales, which were already running out of room amid budget constraints, a growing population and tougher sentencing guidelines.
summary: The recent civil disorder has heaped pressure on prisons in England and Wales, which were already running out of room amid budget constraints, a growing population and tougher sentencing guidelines.

title: UN says a record number of aid workers were killed in 2023 and this year's figures are also high
Deadly bomb blast in Tel Aviv was a terrorist attack, Israeli police say
content: The man carrying the bomb, which exploded near a synagogue, was killed and a passerby was injured, according to police at the scene.
summary: The man carrying the bomb, which exploded near a synagogue, was killed and a passerby was injured, according to police at the scene.

title: 1 dead, 6 missing after sailboat sinks near Italy's Sicily
Indian-American doctor didn't hear patient’s painful cries during colonoscopy due to missing hearing aids
Canadian hiker missing in Colorado wilderness, rescued after 4 days
content: A hiker from Canada who went missing after leaving a spiritual retreat was found safe four days later in southwest Colorado. The rescue operation highlighted the importance of proper preparation, including carrying communication technology. The event was part of Animas Valley Institute's program, aimed at nature immersion, which has operated since 1980 without incidents before this event.
summary: A hiker from Canada who went missing after leaving a spiritual retreat was found safe four days later in southwest Colorado. The rescue operation highlighted the importance of proper preparation, including carrying communication technology. The event was part of Animas Valley Institute's program, aimed at nature immersion, which has operated since 1980 without incidents before this event.

title: Mississippi police officer gets wrong number text: ‘Bruh, we smoke all the time’, cops reply goes viral
Israel-Gaza ceasefire negotiations: Where does it stand?
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken returned to Israel for his 15th visit to meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu amid rising regional tensions following targeted killings of senior Hamas and Hezbollah leaders. Negotiations for a ceasefire and hostage release in the Gaza conflict show slow progress despite cautious optimism. A potential ceasefire promises regional stability and humanitarian relief.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken returned to Israel for his 15th visit to meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu amid rising regional tensions following targeted killings of senior Hamas and Hezbollah leaders. Negotiations for a ceasefire and hostage release in the Gaza conflict show slow progress despite cautious optimism. A potential ceasefire promises regional stability and humanitarian relief.

title: Republican Barbara Comstock endorses Kamala Harris for President
content: Former Republican congresswoman Barbara Comstock endorsed Kamala Harris’s presidential bid, citing Donald Trump's refusal to acknowledge his loss and threats to democracy. Comstock joined former congressman Denver Riggleman in supporting Harris, while Virginia's GOP establishment remains loyal to Trump. Comstock served Virginia's 10th Congressional District and often clashed with Trump during her tenure.
summary: Former Republican congresswoman Barbara Comstock endorsed Kamala Harris’s presidential bid, citing Donald Trump's refusal to acknowledge his loss and threats to democracy. Comstock joined former congressman Denver Riggleman in supporting Harris, while Virginia's GOP establishment remains loyal to Trump. Comstock served Virginia's 10th Congressional District and often clashed with Trump during her tenure.
